data.prayer: Father, help the 1,333 believers in Korçë to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Korçë, Albania
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 1,333 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 1,333 believers find a person of peace today among the 219,067 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 219,067 people in Korçë who are far from you. Please add 44 new house churches this year.
Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Turk people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Turk people.
Spirit, encourage the church in Korçë, Albania to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Korçë, Albania from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Korçë, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

location.name: Korçë
location.people_groups_list: Romani, Vlax, Egyptian, Balkan, Gorani, Deaf, Albanian
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Romani, Vlax (7,200), Egyptian, Balkan (2,900), Gorani (35,000), Deaf (14,000), Albanian (2,725,000)
